com.st.st25sdk.command

Interface Iso15693CustomKillCommandInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LRi1KTag, LRi2KTag, LRi512Tag, LRiS2KTag, LRiTag, ST25TVTag

    public interface Iso15693CustomKillCommandInterface
    This interface defines all Kill functions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte kill(byte[] unencryptedKillPassword)
      This command is used to kill the tag (does not answer any RF commands) WARNING: This action is irreversible, it will not be possible to recover the tag
      byte lockKill()
      Command allowing to lock the kill password WARNING: This action is irreversible
      byte writeKill(byte[] unencryptedKillPassword)
      Command allowing to change the kill password WARNING: the Kill password should also be locked by calling lockKill()

    • Method Detail

      • kill

        byte kill(byte[] unencryptedKillPassword)
   throws STException
        This command is used to kill the tag (does not answer any RF commands) WARNING: This action is irreversible, it will not be possible to recover the tag
        Parameters:
        unencryptedKillPassword - data that will be compared with the tag's Kill password
        Returns:
        status byte answered by the tag
        Throws:
        STException

      • writeKill

        byte writeKill(byte[] unencryptedKillPassword)
        throws STException
        Command allowing to change the kill password WARNING: the Kill password should also be locked by calling lockKill()
        Parameters:
        unencryptedKillPassword - Kill password that will be stored in the tag
        Returns:
        status byte answered by the tag
        Throws:
        STException

      • lockKill

        byte lockKill()
       throws STException
        Command allowing to lock the kill password WARNING: This action is irreversible
        Returns:
        status byte answered by the tag
        Throws:
        STException
